summary: Refugees receive multiple background checks, taking up to two years.

statements.quote: Weâ€™ve allowed thousands and thousands of people into our country. And there was no way to vet those people. There was no documentation. There was no nothing.

We've taken in tens of thousands of people. We know nothing about them. They can say they vet them. They didn't vet them.  They have no papers. How can you vet somebody when you don't know anything about them and you have no papers? How do you vet them? You can't.

name: refugees can't be vetted
